ComicInfo.Summary:
Story 1: Primal Appearance
Kevin Green becomes Prime, saving a falling airplane that he accidentally destroyed. He uses his power to stop the lecherous gym teacher in his school.
Story 2: From On High
Yrial and the Chieftan speak when she notices a vampire killing a priest in the church. Yrial stalks the vampire, who becomes frantic and accidentally impales himself while falling. Yrial returns back to the sky, telling the Chieftan no living soul has seen her.
Story 3: The Last Mission
The Squad stop a group of terrorists that are holding a junior high school hostage.
Story 4: Once Upon A Bedtime...
Mantra tells a bedtime story to Evie, recounting the history between Archimage and Boneyard.
Story 5: Freex
Boom Boy and Anything find Pressure and invite her to come with them.
ComicInfo.Writer: Gerard Jones,James D. Hudnall,Len Strazewski,Mike W. Barr,Steve Englehart,Chris Ulm,James Hudnall,Gerard Jones,Len Strazewski,Steve Englehart,Chris Ulm,James Hudnall,Mike W. Barr
ComicInfo.Title: Primal Appearance; From on High; The Making of Rune; The Last Mission; Once Upon A Bedtime...
